meanings.definition: A list of selected candidates or items for final consideration.
meanings.sent1: The company's shortlist of potential candidates for the job included three people.
meanings.sent2: She added his name to the shortlist of nominees for the award.
meanings.sent3: The shortlist of desserts for the party made everyone excited.
meanings.sent4: The shortlist of vacation destinations was filled with exotic locations.
meanings.sent5: The shortlist of books to read over the summer was carefully chosen.

meanings.definition: To select or nominate for final consideration.
meanings.sent1: They will shortlist the best designs for the competition.
meanings.sent2: He decided to shortlist her for the lead role in the play.
meanings.sent3: I will shortlist the most delicious recipes for our cooking class.
meanings.sent4: She shortlisted her favorite songs for the upcoming concert.
meanings.sent5: The committee will shortlist the top candidates for the scholarship.
